Rooftop solar EOL → building-integrated collection points; enables residential circular economy participation
Collection centers in 100 cities → integrates with municipal waste management; 299 facilities nationwide

Community solar projects → local EOL management; neighborhood awareness of material cycles

Collection infrastructure barrier: 299 centers need ₹4,274 Cr capex; municipal budgets strained

Recycling infrastructure → domestic material supply → manufacturing cost reduction → more domestic production
Community impact requires: Awareness campaigns + accessible collection points + incentive programs

Via reverse logistics: Collection network → urban freight optimization → reduced transport costs
